title: Top 10 Dentists in Charlotte, North Carolina
text: Charlotte, the Queen City, is home to some of the most skilled and innovative dental professionals in the Tar Heel State. From cosmetic dentistry to family practices, these dentists stand out for their expertise, patient care, and cutting-edge approaches. Let’s explore the cream of the crop in Charlotte’s dental scene. 1. Dr. Stella O. Nnadi – Dr. Stella O. Nnadi, DMD [Website](https://www.drnnadi.com/) Dr. Stella O. Nnadi leads her practice with a commitment to providing top-tier dental services in Charlotte. Her clinic offers a comprehensive range of treatments, including cosmetic dentistry, dental implants, laser teeth whitening, and dentures. Dr. Nnadi’s years of experience and dedication to using the latest technology and techniques in general dentistry have earned her a reputation as one of the best dentists in Charlotte. Her patient-first approach ensures that each individual receives personalized care tailored to their specific needs. 2. Dr. Andrew T. Hauschka – Dentistry of the Carolinas [Website](https://dentistryofthecarolinas.com/dentists/andrew-hauschka-dds/) As a third-generation dentist in Charlotte, Dr. Andrew T. Hauschka brings a wealth of family expertise to his practice. Specializing in esthetic restorative dentistry, appliance fabrication, dental surgery, and sports dentistry, Dr. Hauschka is dedicated to providing the very latest procedures and techniques. His commitment to using cutting-edge technology in a clean environment sets him apart. Offering a wide range of services from preventative and restorative care to orthodontics and periodontics, Dr. Hauschka ensures comprehensive dental care for his patients. 3. Dr. Christopher A. Bowman II – Dr. Christopher A. Bowman II, DDS [Dr. Christopher A. Bowman II’s LinkedIn ](https://www.linkedin.com/in/christopher-bowman-dds)[Profile](https://www.linkedin.com/in/charlottedentist/) Dr. Christopher A. Bowman II has established himself as one of the best dentists in Charlotte, NC, with his overflowing credentials and pride in his work. His state-of-the-art dental office and highly skilled dental team create a comfortable and at-ease environment for patients. Dr. Bowman’s practice provides a wide range of services, from cosmetic dentistry and sedation dentistry to adult orthodontics. His commitment to excellence in dental care has earned him a loyal patient base in Charlotte. 4. Dr. Thomas W. Farley – Thomas W. Farley, DDS [Dr. Thomas W. Farley’s Yelp](https://www.linkedin.com/in/thomas-farley-dds) Dr. Thomas W. Farley’s practice centers on quality, excellence, and patient comfort. With over 15 years of endorsement from Dave Ramsey, Dr. Farley has earned a reputation for integrity and exceptional service. His warm staff takes pleasure in providing individualized services for each patient’s specific needs and wants. Offering a full range of dental services from restorative to periodontics to whitening procedures, Dr. Farley’s practice is equipped with the latest diagnostic and treatment technology. 5. Dr. Scott A. Menaker – Scott A Menaker DDS PA [Dr. Scott A. Menaker’s Healthgrades](https://www.healthgrades.com/dentist/dr-scott-menaker-xljcd) Dr. Scott A. Menaker’s practice, SmileCharlotte, has created a dental experience that combines a modern, technologically advanced office with a well-educated and well-trained staff. As a cosmetic dentist in Charlotte, Dr. Menaker offers services such as Invisalign, cosmetic fillings, bonding procedures, and general cosmetic dentistry. His commitment to staying at the forefront of dental technology ensures that patients receive the most advanced and effective treatments available. 6. Dr. Chase Prettyman – Dentistry of the Carolinas [Dr. Chase Prettyman’s LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/chase-prettyman-dds)[ ](https://www.linkedin.com/in/chase-prettyman-b448a664/)[Profile](https://www.linkedin.com/in/chase-prettyman-dds) Dr. Chase Prettyman is part of the renowned Dentistry of the Carolinas, which has grown to showcase its expertise in general, pediatric, and sports dentistry, as well as orthodontics and prosthodontics across 11 locations throughout Charlotte. Dr. Prettyman and his colleagues are dedicated to giving each person teeth that are beautiful and healthy – something they can proudly smile about. His approach to dentistry combines technical skill with a warm, personable manner. 7. Dr. Samuel Burrow – Burrow Orthodontics [Dr. Samuel Burrow’s LinkedIn ](https://www.linkedin.com/in/samuel-burrow-dds)[Profile](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dr-samuel-burrow-86b2427a/) Dr. Samuel Burrow completed his undergraduate studies and received his Doctor of Dental Surgery degree from the University of North Carolina Chapel Hill. With over 30 years of experience, his clinic, Burrow & Case Orthodontics, has become a respected provider of orthodontics in the Charlotte area. Dr. Burrow’s expertise in creating beautiful, healthy smiles has boosted the confidence of countless patients. His commitment to staying current with the latest orthodontic techniques ensures that patients receive the most effective treatments. 8. Dr. Alfred Jackson – Alfred Jackson’s Practice [Dr. Alfred Jackson’s Healthgrades](https://www.healthgrades.com/dentist/dr-alfred-jackson-3dfcq) Dr. Alfred Jackson has established himself as a professional and well-versed Charlotte dentist with years of experience. Specializing in various dental health care services such as dental implants, cosmetic dentistry, teeth cleaning, and partial dentures, Dr. Jackson has grown his clientele by providing quality dental care at affordable rates. His comprehensive approach to dentistry ensures that patients receive thorough care for all their dental needs. 9. Dr. Sean Hair – Sean Hair’s Practice [Dr. Sean Hair’s LinkedIn Profile](https://www.linkedin.com/in/sean-hair-81b7b138/) Dr. Sean Hair is a dedicated and trusted Charlotte dentist who provides comprehensive services for dental emergencies, dentures, porcelain veneers, and teeth whitening. As a well-rounded emergency dentist, Dr. Hair is grounded in the mission to help clients achieve all their health goals and needs. His innovative techniques and approaches, coupled with cutting-edge technologies, make him a top choice for patients seeking high-quality dental care in Charlotte. 10. Dr. Jennifer Rosdail – Myers Park Dental Care [Website](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jennifer-rosdail-dds) At Myers Park Dental Care, Dr. Jennifer Rosdail offers the best in general and cosmetic dentistry that Charlotte has to offer. Her practice is known for providing top-quality professional oral care using the latest technological innovations. Dr. Rosdail’s expertise covers a wide range of services, including dental cleaning, whitening, dental implants, porcelain veneers, and root canal therapy. Her commitment to patient education and comfort has made her a favorite among those seeking exceptional dental care in Charlotte.
